definition: to suffer enough from/to suffer all kinds of/to have one's fill of
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: Because of the nature of impermanence within the clouds, the river suffered very much.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩那變化無常的本性，可讓小河受盡了苦頭。

sentences.english: In old society, he was miserable from cold and hunger.
sentences.chinese: 在舊社會，他受盡飢寒交迫之苦。
人民受盡了不公正的壓迫。

sentences.english: He was subjected to the rod in all its rigors in this school.
sentences.chinese: 他在這所學校裏受盡了笞杖體罰之苦。

sentences.english: It is hard to bear up under affliction.
sentences.chinese: 受盡折磨仍不屈不撓是很不容易的。

sentences.english: They suffered a lot under the invader's heel.
sentences.chinese: 在侵略者的鐵蹄下，他們受盡了奴役。

sentences.english: In spite of all kinds of torture, Sister Jiang gritted her teeth without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 儘管受盡各種刑罰，江姐咬緊牙關不開口。

sentences.english: In sociological branch system, it always suffers all kinds of abasement as second-class citizen.
sentences.chinese: 在社會學科體系中，它總是作爲二等公民受盡屈辱。

sentences.english: His family suffered all kinds of hardships during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他家在戰爭期間受盡了苦難。

sentences.english: He remained unbending under the severest of tortures.
sentences.chinese: 他受盡酷刑，仍然堅貞不屈。

sentences.english: They inflicted all kinds of indignities on their captives.
sentences.chinese: 被俘的士兵在敵人手中受盡侮辱。

sentences.english: The people were ground down by lack of food and money.
sentences.chinese: 人們受盡了缺糧少錢的折磨。

sentences.english: Other civilians say they were stripped naked, abused and photographed.
sentences.chinese: 其他平民稱，他們被剝光衣服，受盡恥辱並被拍照。

sentences.english: I would rather suffer in your arms than die without you.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願在你的懷抱受盡折磨也不願離你故去。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong was full of setbacks and frustrations in her life, suffering from all kinds of tribulation. She died in Hong Kong for illness only at 31 years old.
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅一生命途多舛，受盡磨難，31歲就在香港病故。
